title: Widow of slain Emanuel AME pastor sets the tone during Greenville gun hearing
title_page: Widow of slain Emanuel AME pastor sets the tone during Greenville gun hearing
maintext:
GREENVILLE — The widow of slain Sen. Clementa Pinckney, one of the nine worshippers gunned down at Emanuel AME Church, told a panel of senators examining South Carolina’s gun laws that his murder should be a lesson.
“Clementa’s death can teach us lessons and can make our society safer and more secure,” Jennifer Pinckney said. “It would have been so like my husband, the late Sen. Clementa Pinckney, to be standing here before you, imploring, urging, pleading with you to do something about the current gun laws that we have.”
Read the full article, available from the Post and Courier
http://www.postandcourier.com/article/20160915/PC1603/160919572/1006
